text: On May 15, 2022, a mass shooting happened at Geneva Presbyterian Church in Laguna Woods, Orange County, California, United States. One person was killed, and five others were injured, four of them critically. Most of the church attendees were Taiwanese-American. A suspect was taken into custody. ==References== Category:2022 in California Category:2022 mass shootings in the United States Category:2022 murders in the United States Category:2020s crimes in California Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2022 Category:Attacks on churches Category:Attacks on religious buildings and structures in the United States Category:Mass shootings in California Category:May 2022 events Category:Murders by firearm in California Category:Orange County, California Category:Religious building shootings
title: 2022 Laguna Woods shooting
